properties.address: Cheam Library, Church Road, Cheam, Sutton SM3 8QH
properties.description: Cheam Library is accessible on the ground floor where all services and public toilets are located. There is a public pay & display car park adjacent plus spaces for Blue Badge holders. Please note Warm Space Volunteers are located at nearby Sutton Library.
properties.title: Cheam Library

properties.address: Christ Church Ewell, Cheam Road, Ewell, Surrey KT17 1AD

properties.title: Christ Church Ewell

properties.description: Circle Library is fully accessible and has automatic doors. Free car parking is available at the rear of the building. Warm Space Volunteers will be on site Thursday & Friday, 10am-1pm & 1-4pm to signpost for information and advice.

properties.description: Library @ The Life Centre is located within the Sutton Life Centre. The Library is fully accessible via a ramp from street level and has automatic doors. Warm Space Volunteers will be on site Mon-Fri 10am-1pm & 1-4pm to signpost for information and advice.
properties.title: Library @ the Life Centre

properties.address: Library @ the Phoenix Centre, Mollison Drive, Roundshaw, Wallington SM6 9NZ
properties.description: Located within the Leisure Centre. Fully accessible & with free car parking. The library is self-service only from 9-9:30am Mon-Sat & 10:00-16:00 on Sun. Warm Space Volunteers will be on site Tue & Thu 10am-1pm & 1-4pm to signpost for information & advice.
properties.title: Library @ the Phoenix Centre

properties.address: 39 Arnhem Drive, New Addington, Croydon CR0 0EE
properties.description: Open from 01-11-2022. All are welcome to join in the groups or to come and enjoy time alongside them in the cafe (you don't have to join in!) Community Cafe is open on a pay as you feel basis. Tues 10-12 Crafty Needles (Knitting and Crochet), 1.15pm-2.45pm Stay and Play Toddlers. Weds 10-12 Poppy Cafe Mental Health Support Group.
properties.title: New Addington Baptist Church

properties.address: St George's Church, Barrow Road, Croydon, London CR0 4EZ

properties.address: Croham Road / Croham Park Avenue, South Croydon, Croydon CR2 7HF
properties.description: Open from From 20 October 2022 to end March 2023. All volunteers are fully DBS checked and we welcome people of all ages.
